column4: Hmmm ... i just installed libcurl with sudo apt-get install php-curl ... but apt gives me a list of packets « that have been automatically installed and are no longer necessary » .... Is it really SAFE to remove them ?
Those are python packets for the most
You can remove them with apt-get autoremove. If it removes anything you happened to need, you can simply reinstall the package
Typically it's always safe to remove them
